thread.title: Hotel Le A.. Great hotel and great staff
thread.title_full: Hotel Le A.. Great hotel and great staff - Review of Hotel Le A, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Fabrizio F
title: Hotel Le A.. Great hotel and great staff
text: Went to Paris with my wife for a relaxing holiday.. we stayed at Hotel Le A for 4 nights.. Hotel is 5 min walk from Champs Elysees.. the hotel has modern contemporary design, very clean and staff are very helpful.. Beds are comfy, bathrooms are 5 star and overall rooms are very nice.. if you like a modern and comfy hotel, Le A is ideal..
